attributes.action: Prevent the oil companies profiteering on the back of Diesel customers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every time the price for unleaded petrol reduces, the price for diesel remains the same or reduces by less, the difference between the price of a litre of diesel is now regularly 15p or more whereas at the height of the price the difference was much less. The oil companies should be prevented from making profits on diesel that then subsidize unleaded fuel.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
